title: Labels
description: When Hayley Carson moves into her new house she has one goal, to get through the summer and her last year of high school. She has a plan to stay in the background unnoticed so that she can get through the year with ease. Then, she meets Alex and Julian, two local best friends that instantly take a liking to her. Through her friendship with Alex and Julian, Hayley slowly begins to let down her guard. She realizes that she should be proud of who she is, no matter how others label her. Labels is a story about learning to love and accept yourself for who you are and learning to accept the love of those who care.
author: Savannah Munholland
